name: Processing
longDesc: A sparsely decorated room.  A metal hatch is here on the South wall, but it appears to be locked.  There is a strange small hole next to the door, which might affect the hatch.  The metal door to the East leads back to the hallway.
shortDesc: This is a sparsely decorated room.  A metal hatch is here on the South wall, but it appears to be locked.  There is a small hole next to the door. There is a metal door back to the hallway to the East.
feat1desc: A rounded metal hatch.  There is some kind of locking mechanism on it.
feat1interactSuccess: With a loud creak, the hatch reluctantly opens up.  You see daylight outside.
feat1interactComplete: The hatch is open.  The outside air is right in front of you.
feat1interactFail: You are unable to open the hatch.  Perhaps you need to do something to unlock it?
feat2desc: The small hole leads to a long cylindrical tube. It's about the right size you could stick your arm into. It is too dark to see what is inside of it.
feat2interactOptions: put hand in, stick hand in, put arm in, stick arm in, insert hand, insert arm
feat2interactSuccess: You reluctantly stick your arm into the small hole.  You can feel a crank at the end of it.
feat2interactComplete: The small hole leads to a long cylindrical tube with a crank at the end.
feat2interactFail: You are unable to use the device.
feat3desc: You can't see it, but you can feel the crank deep inside the tube.  It feels like it can be cranked out towards you.
feat3interactSuccess: You pull the crank out towards you.  It moves slowly at first, then suddenly there is a loud click and the crank stops.  You release the crank and retract your arm.  It appears to have locked a metal bracelet around your wrist. You hear the hiss of an airlock releasing coming from the metal hatch.
feat4desc: A metal bracelet you seem to have acquired when you put your arm in the small hole and used the crank. Printed on the bracelet is 'Northern Medical Research Center, phone: (217) 335-1251.'
feat4interactOptions: pull on, remove, examine, take off
feat4interactSuccess: You try to remove the bracelet.  It won't come off.
feat4interactComplete: A metal bracelet that is printed with 'Northern Medical Research Center, phone: (217) 335-1251.' You are not able to remove it.
feat4interactFail: It doesn't work.  You can't get the bracelet off.
feat5desc: A metal door leading back to the hallway.
feat5interactSuccess: You try the handle on the metal door. It's unlocked!
feat5interactComplete: An unlocked metal door leading back to the hallway.
